ISSUE.TITLE: Compatility issue with Django 2.2
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Djoser is not compatible with Django 2.2 expected to be released on April 1st. The change in [urlsafe_base64_encode](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/2.2/ref/utils/#django.utils.http.urlsafe_base64_encode) broke djoser's `encode_uid` in `utils.py`. ``` File ".../python3.7/site-packages/djoser/utils.py", line 9, in encode_uid return urlsafe_base64_encode(force_bytes(pk)).decode() AttributeError: 'str' object has no attribute 'decode' ```
